name: @intelligenics/cli
description: This package provides cli commands for the intelligenics modular processes

scripts.prepublish-projects: cd .. && node cli npm run pre-publish
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish-local: npm run build && npm pack && npm i intelligenics-cli-1.0.12.tgz -g
scripts.generate-solution: npm run build && igx g solution
scripts.generate-module: npm run build && igx g module --company=Microlise --product=Jcb --module=Dataview
